main: ^A group of disheveled looking men and women approach your car. Their clothes are worn and sweaty, and a few of them carry knives and improvised clubs. They do not appear to be having a good time.
choice: ^One of them speaks up. "Oi! We know youse gots the good stuff! We ain't had nothin since our pub closed down- give us some, or else!" How could they know? Are they bluffing?

c-0: ^They don't look so tough. You can take them.
c-1: ^Might as well not attract too much attention.
